name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry REDMOND, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry REDMOND, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Nicholas T. Long, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Martin L. Trichon, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
347 A.2d 485
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry REDMOND, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 1975.
Nicholas T. Long, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Martin L. Trichon, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
